KnowledgeBase.Title: Example NumMatrix compareGT 023
KnowledgeBase.RelatedFunctions: compare compareEQ compareNE compareGE compareLT compareLE

Example.Description: These examples use the compareGT function to compare two NumMatrices and return the Boolean value, true or false. The corresponding values of each NumMatrix are compared to determine whether one NumMatrix is greater than the other.

Syntax.Note: The value of the first Matrix is greater than the value of the second NumMatrix.
The value of the first Matrix is lesser than the value of the second Matrix.
